    • Method Detail

      • get

        public E get(int x,
    int y)
        Get the element at the location (x, y) from the Grid.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location on the Grid to get the element from.
        y - The vertical location on the Grid to get the element from.
        Returns:
        The element instance at the specified location.

      • set

        public boolean set(int x,
          int y,
          E element)
        Set the value of the element at the specified location (x, y) on the Grid.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location on the Grid to add the element to.
        y - The vertical location on the Grid to add the element to.
        element - The element instance to add to the Grid.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the element was successfully added to the Grid.

      • remove

        public void remove(int x,
          int y)
        Remove the element at the specified location of (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location on the Grid to remove the element from.
        y - The vertical location on the Grid to remove the element from.

        Get whether or not the Grid is empty.

        Whether or not the Grid is empty.

      • getValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<E> getValues()
        Get all of the values from the Grid.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList full of all of the values on the Grid.
